message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 50-50.
I'll take the higher amount this time, but I'm willing to negotiate
I've adjusted my proposal based on Bob's last offer. I now suggest dividing the money 45-55.
I'll take a slightly smaller share this time, but I still think I deserve more
I've tried to find a middle ground. My new proposal suggests a division of 35-65. I hope this meets your expectations.
I'm not getting any younger, I want a bigger share now
I understand your desire for a larger share, but I also need to ensure a fair distribution. My latest proposal suggests a division of 25-75. Please consider it carefully.
